## News

* The next Tracking POG meeting will overlap with CMS Physics&Upgrade
  Week in Ischia and will be cancelled.

* We have been (finally) taking data with 25ns (and 50ns again)
  buch-crossing for the past days with magnet on.

* We created a Twiki Page to collect the public results produced for
  EPS 2015: you can find it
  [[here]](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/TrackingPOGPlotsEPS2015). Please
  take your time and fill it up with the results you obtained that
  were approved in the official DP note
  [[link]](http://cds.cern.ch/record/2037373/files/DP2015_016.pdf?version=1).

* The final goal is to produce a public PAS that contains the most
  relevant results obtained with the first data collected. The idea is
  that <font class="bold red">each individual group/responsible will
  produce an AN that contains all the details and studies
  performed</font>. All the ANs will then be <font class="red
  bold">merged</font> into the final PAS.

* So far we envisage the following contribution:

1. $D^*$ analysis
1. Efficiency using T&P
1. $V^0$ Studies
1. Data/MC

* We will privately contact the main responsibles for each
  contribution to arrange a more detailed plan.
